actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to place certain restrictions on the storage and demilitarization of chemical munitions and lethal chemical agents at Lexington-Bluegrass Army Depot, Kentucky, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Places upon the Secretary of Defense certain restrictions concerning the storage and demilitarization of chemical munitions and lethal chemical agents at Lexington-Bluegrass Army Depot, Kentucky.

titles.title: A bill to place certain restrictions on the storage and demilitarization of chemical munitions and lethal chemical agents at Lexington-Bluegrass Army Depot, Kentucky, and for other purposes.
